Title: Buffy vs Dracula
Plot: Giles tells Willow that he's planning to move back to England since he's feeling less then vital to the work in Sunnydale. Meanwhile on patrol, Buffy runs into a vampire who claims to be Dracula. Dracula turns out to have powers above and beyond the vampire norm such as the ability to turn into a mist and then re-appear, and the ability to turn into a bat.   The gang sets about researching Dracula. Dracula visits Buffy during the night and drinks some of her blood but leaves her alive and under
GuestStars: Rudolf Martin, E. J. Gage, Scott Berman, Marita Schaub, Leslee Jean Matta, Jennifer Slimko, Michelle Trachtenberg
